dict.acceptation: 逐字地；照字面地；确实地，真正地；[口语]差不多，简直（用于加强语意）；

sent.orig: Yeah that stuff stinks. Like literally stinks and also as in stinks.
sent.trans: 没错，那东西真的很臭。就像它字面上的意思这麽臭，而实际上也真的臭。

sent.orig: The Royal Court just literally walked away from Angkor completely.
sent.trans: 皇室完全地离开了吴哥。
他逐字逐句地翻译这段文字。

sent.orig: The water's salinity is so high here-more than30 percent-that it's literally impossible to sink.
sent.trans: 死海的盐度很高，大大超过30%根本不可能下沉。

sent.orig: Our hotel suite had a regulation size bowling alley literally in the room.
sent.trans: 我们的酒店套间有一条标准尺寸的保龄球道在房中。
